text:
Hai Ram ke wajood pe Hindostan ko naaz
Ahl-e-nazar samajhte hain us ko Imam-e-Hind

Saare jahan se accha Hindostan hamara
Hum bulbulen hain is ki, ye gulsitan hamara

Aaeen-e-jawanmardan haq-goi o bebaki
Allah ke sheron ko aati nahi rubahi

Moti samajh ke shaan-e-Karimi ne chun liye
Qatre jo the mere arq-e-infi'aal ke

Aql ko tanqeed se fursat nahi
Ishq par aamaal ki buniyad rakh

Gala to ghont diya ahl-e-madarsa ne tera
Kahan se aaye sada la ilaha illallah

Main tujh ko batata hoon taqdeer-e-umam kya hai
Shamsheer-o-sinaan awwal, ta'uso-rubab aakhir

Tu ne ye kya ghazab kiya, mujh ko bhi faash kar diya
Main hi to ek raaz tha seena-e-kainat mein

Bhari bazm mein raaz ki baat keh di
Bada be-adab hoon, saza chahta hoon

Ye jannat mubarak rahe zahidon ko
Ke main aap ka saamna chahta hoon

Jalaal-e-padshahi ho ke jamhoori tamasha ho
Juda ho deen siyasat se to reh jaati hai Changezi
Apne favorite mein shamil kijiye, share kijiye

Tera Imam be-huzoor, teri namaz be-suroor
Aisi namaz se guzar, aise Imam se guzar
Apne favorite mein shamil kijiye, share kijiye

Phool ki patti se kat sakta hai heere ka jigar
Mard-e-nadan par kalam-e-narm-o-naazuk be-asar

Meer-e-Arab ko aayi thandi hawa jahan se
Mera watan wahi hai, mera watan wahi hai

Tujhe kitaab se mumkin nahi firaaq ke tu
Kitaab-khwan hai magar saahib-e-kitaab nahi

Khudawanda ye tere saadadil bande kidhar jaayein
Ke darveshi bhi ayyaari hai, sultani bhi ayyaari

Saudagari nahi ye, ibadat Khuda ki hai
Ae be-khabar, jaza ki tamanna bhi chhod de

Na poocho mujh se lazzat khaanama-barbaad rehne ki
Nasheman saikadon maine bana kar phoonk daale hain

Kabhi hum se, kabhi ghairon se shanasaayi hai
Baat kehne ki nahi, tu bhi to harjaayi hai
Apne favorite mein shamil kijiye, share kijiye

Jinhein main dhoondhta tha aasmaanon mein, zameenon mein
Woh nikle mere zulmat-khaana-e-dil ke makeeno mein

Aql ayyar hai, sau bhes badal leti hai
Ishq bechara na zahid hai, na mulla, na hakeem

Ye kainaat abhi na-tamaam hai shaayad
Ke aa rahi hai damadam sada-e-kun faya kun

Mahine wasl ke ghadiyon ki surat udte jaate hain
Magar ghadiyan judaayi ki guzarti hain maheenon mein

Umeed-e-hoor ne sab kuch sikha rakha hai waiz ko
Ye hazrat dekhne mein seedhe-saade bhole-bhaale hain

Mujhe roke ga tu ai nakhuda kya gharaq hone se
Ke jin ko doobna hai doob jaate hain safeenon mein

Anokhi wazaâ€™ hai, saare zamane se niraale hain
Ye aashiq kaun si basti ke, ya-Rab rehne waale hain

Milega manzil-e-maqsood ka usi ko suraagh
Andheri shab mein hai cheete ki aankh jiska charaagh

Hue madfoon-e-dariya, zer-e-dariya tairne waale
Tamaanche mauj ke khaate the, jo ban kar guhar nikle

Haan dikha de ai tasavvur, phir wo subh o shaam tu
Daud peeche ki taraf ai gardish-e-ayyam tu

Sabaq mila hai ye meraaj-e-Mustafa se mujhe
Ke aalam-e-bashariyat ki zad mein hai gardoon

Attar ho, Rumi ho, Razi ho, Ghazali ho
Kuch haath nahi aata be-aah-e-sahar-gaahi

Zaahir ki aankh se na tamaasha kare koi
Ho dekhna to deeda-e-dil waa kare koi

Mana ke teri deed ke qaabil nahi hoon main
Tu mera shauq dekh, mera intezaar dekh
